name: ParaSight (catonice)
description:
Very simple 8-Bit retro themed bug platformer where you must eat humans in the sewers to grow. 

Made using Playmaker, Unity, Aseprite and BeepBox.

I was originally hoping to add more stages to the bug's development but I ran out of time and was stuck with a very basic game but in the process I learnt Playmaker and a bit more about Unity. I am quite the beginner!
